title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: The original image is displayed even after importing a new image into the layout again.
EB: When importing a new image into the layout again, the new image should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import the file named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 
2. Import the same file 'image1.jpg' into the layout again. 

Expected result: The newly imported 'image1.jpg' should be displayed. 
Actual result: The original 'image1.jpg' is still displayed.
